meanings.definition: A mat placed on the floor of a bathroom to absorb water after a bath or shower.
meanings.sent1: The bathmats in the bathroom are soft and colorful.
meanings.sent2: I bought new bathmats for our bathroom to keep the floor dry.
meanings.sent3: The bathmats in the bathroom had a party and soaked up all the water.
meanings.sent4: The bathmats were like thirsty sponges on the bathroom floor.
meanings.sent5: Stepping on the bathmats felt like stepping on fluffy clouds.
